title: ups win UAE launch through CEPA Council's flagship innovation programme
description: According to the release, the competition drew more than 10,000 applications from across India, with 20 finalists selected to present their solutions in sectors ranging from artificial intelligence, fintech, sustainability, and health technology to manufacturing, agriculture, space, and next-generation mobility.
content:
New Delhi [India], November 28 (ANI): Five Indian start-ups have secured a fully sponsored soft landing in the United Arab Emirates after emerging as winners of the UAE-India CEPA Council's Start-Up Series.

title: Chinese smart manufacturing hub Qiantang District leverages AI to drive pharmaceutical innovation
description: HANGZHOU, China, Nov. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As artificial intelligence (AI) has entered a fast track of application and implementation, east China's Zhejiang Province has embraced the 'AI Plus' initiative with a key focus on biomedical engineering, with its renowned smart manufacturing district of Qiantang rising to become a leading force in the field.

title: Taiwan raises 2025 GDP growth forecast on surge in AI demand
description: Taiwan's tech-reliant economy is expected to grow faster than previously expected in 2025, riding the wave of demand for artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the statistics office said on Friday.
content:
TAIPEI, Nov 28 (Reuters) - Taiwan's tech-reliant economy is expected to grow faster than previously expected in 2025, riding the wave of demand for artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the statistics office said on Friday.

title: SPOT-MAS Launches in Taiwan: AI-Powered Multi-Cancer Early Detection Ushers in a New Era of Precision Medicine
description: TAIPEI, Nov. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Precision medicine is entering a new era, driven by breakthroughs in genetic technology and Artificial Intelligence (AI). Multi-Cancer Early Detection (MCED) has become a global trend, and Taiwan joins this movement with the introduction of SPOT-MAS- an advanced screening solution developed by Gene Solutions, a global leader in precision oncology and genomics, in collaboration with local partner Gene Health.
